inclusion.criterion: this study will deal with the protocols applied in Assiut university children hospital
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: children below age of 1 year and more than 17 years old
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: use of oral corticosteroids in the previous four weeks
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Significant co-morbid disease : lung ,cardiac ,immune , liver , endocrine
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: children with other causes of respiratory distress
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Children with mild or controlled asthma
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 39-year-old man with cough and shortness of breath, history of asthma for 3 years, FEV1 of 63% predicted.
